alert.note: Alert for Grenada; Montgomery (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 4:38PM CDT until March 30 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Grenada County in north central Mississippi... Northwestern Montgomery County in north central Mississippi... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 438 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Scobey to near Coila, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Duck Hill around 505 PM CDT. Misterton around 515 PM CDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
